name: Kungfu Ninja Fighting
description:
True heroes fight on street with no limits, feel the power and strength of street fighting games, Its your time to master your ninja warrior killer instinct and revenge on street in Kungfu Ninja Fighting

Game Features:
- Realistic 3D Ninja City.
- Realistic stealth and combat movements.
- Bloody action.
- Wonderful background music.
- Smooth gameplay.
- Fun and Exciting levels.
- Stunning & High Quality 3D Graphics
